column6: Hold it Max.
We're going to have a briefing, and I'd like you to attend.
Yes Lieutenant.
All right pilots, listen up!
I won't sugarcoat this. Things are looking grim.
The enemy appears to have a formidable drone army.
We had to surrender our capital, and we've sustained heavy losses.
But, I believe we have sufficient firepower to mount a counterattack.
We're NOT going to give them time to dig into defensive positions!
We'll take them by surprise, and strike back immediately.
Hear, hear!
Let's take them down!
This planet behind me... Its fate rests in our hands.
Now go!
(Oliver... I'll find you! I promise)
Good to see you made it, Max.
Lieutenant, has any of the cadets made it back yet?
I'm afraid not. There has been no sign of them since they left the Academy.
(Oliver... please be okay!)
We'll be on the lookout for them, of course.
For now, we have to focus on regrouping and planning our next move
...Yes Lieutenant.
